isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - WASHER RESERVOIR/PUMP MOTOR WITH ELECTRIC WIPERS

svcproc.title: WASHER RESERVOIR/PUMP MOTOR WITH ELECTRIC WIPERS

svcprocinfo.para: Refer to Figure 108 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Drain washer solution from the washer reservoir (Item 10).
Disconnect the washer hose (Item 3) and the electric connectors (Item 1) from the pump motor (Item 2).
Remove the washer reservoir mounting bolts (Item 12), then remove the washer reservoir with pump motor assembly (Items 2 and 10) from the vehicle.
Position the washer reservoir with pump motor assembly (Items 2 and 10) on the vehicle and install the mounting bolts (Item 12).
Connect the electric connectors (Item 1) and washer hose (Item 3) to the pump motor (Item 2). Connect the battery ground cable.
Fill the washer reservoir with windshield washer solution and check washer operation.
